Articles.Content:
Hi all! 

I know asteroids vary in Mass even if they're the same class. Do they also vary in size? I'm wondering if I could find a little Class A Asteroid that would fit inside a mk 3 cargo bay.

Thanks.

From what I've seen, they vary in size based mostly on the amount of ore they're carrying. Class A's are already pretty small, and you could make it smaller by mining the ore out of it. Not too sure if it would fit in a cargo bay or not, though.
They vary slightly, but a class A is still the diameter of a fully extended gigantor. So you're never gonna find one that small.

I don't have a screenshot, but the gold magic boulder in this video is a 2-ton class-A, and the smallest I've ever found. And just as @bewing said, it's about the diameter as one of the fully extended gigantors.
